```{r, echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(kableExtra))
d <- readRDS("~/GoogleDrive/KBO/standings_pred.rds")
d$team <- paste0("[", d$team, "](/teams/", gsub(" ", "", tolower(d$team)), ")") 
kable(d, digits = c(0,0,3,2,1,1,1,1,1,1), row.names = T, col.names = c("Team","Elo", "wOBA", "FIP", "1st","2nd","3rd","4th","5th","Out")) %>%
  add_header_above(c("Current Elos & 2021 Stats" = 5, "2022 Playoff Seed Likelihood (%)" = 6)) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), fixed_thead = T) %>% column_spec(2, bold = T) %>% column_spec(5, border_right = T)
```
Projections based on 20,000 Monte Carlo simulations. See the [FAQ](https://www.kbofancystats.com/faq/eloratings/) for more details on Elo ratings.
